abstract: United Parcel Service has submitted concessions to European antitrust authorities as it seeks regulatory approval for its proposed $6.8 billion takeover of the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.
snippet: United Parcel Service has submitted concessions to European antitrust authorities as it seeks regulatory approval for its proposed $6.8 billion takeover of the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — United Parcel Service said on Friday that it had submitted concessions to European antitrust authorities as it seeks regulatory approval for its proposed takeover of the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.

headline.main: U.P.S. Offers Concessions to Secure TNT Express Takeover
